# Core team alums

- **Nick Michaud** is a Statistician at Vertex Pharmaceuticals who contributed to various NIMBLE algorithms and NIMBLE internals as a postdoc.
- **[Clifford Anderson-Bergman](http://cliffstats.weebly.com/)** is a Statistician at Lawrence Livermore National Lab.
- **Jagadish Babu** contributed to an early pre-release version of NIMBLE.

# Collaborators

- **Claudia Wehrhahn Cortes**, is a visiting assistant professor at the University of California, Santa Cruz, Department of Applied Mathematics & Statistics implementing Bayesian nonparametric methods in NIMBLE.
- **[Abel Rodriguez](https://stat.uw.edu/about-us/people/abel-rodriguez)** is a faculty member at the University of Washington Department of Statistics
- **[Wei Zhang](https://www.gla.ac.uk/schools/mathematicsstatistics/staff/weizhang/)** is a lecturer in the School of Mathematics and Statistics at the University of Glasgow who has contributed to NIMBLE methods and applications.
- **[Sally Paganin](https://www.hsph.harvard.edu/profile/sally-paganin/)** is a postdoc at Harvard School of Public Health who has contributed to NIMBLE methods and applications.
